meanings.definition: Neurobiologists: Scientists who study the biology of the nervous system.
meanings.sent1: Neurobiologists use microscopes to examine brain cells.
meanings.sent2: Many neurobiologists work in research labs to understand the nervous system better.
meanings.sent3: The neurobiologists at the conference had a brainy discussion about neurons.
meanings.sent4: In the world of science, neurobiologists are like detectives investigating the brain's mysteries.
meanings.sent5: The neurobiologists' passion for understanding the nervous system is truly inspiring.

meanings.definition: Neurobiologists: Those who specialize in the study of the nervous system.
meanings.sent1: A group of neurobiologists discovered a new neurotransmitter.
meanings.sent2: Neurobiologists often collaborate with neurologists to improve patient care.
meanings.sent3: The neurobiologists' party was full of brain-teasing puzzles and games.
meanings.sent4: To unravel the secrets of the mind, neurobiologists dive deep into the brain's complexities.
meanings.sent5: The neurobiologists' dedication to unraveling the mysteries of the nervous system is commendable.
